description: Retrieve global Wwise information and settings.
Retrieves the list of Wwise objects matching the query. Supports from, where, transform, options.

options.return: array of property names to return in results

description: Creates an object of the given type under the given parent.
Moves the specified object to a new parent.
Sets a property value for the given object.

description: Sets a reference value for the given object. Used for OutputBus, Target, RTPC bindings.

args_schema.platform: string (optional) - Note: default changed in 2024.1, recommend explicit value

notes: 2024.1 platform parameter default changed. Always specify platform explicitly.

description: Returns the list of property and reference names for the given object type.
Generates SoundBanks. In 2024.1 Auto-Defined mode, this is usually not needed.

description: Returns the objects included in a SoundBank.
Returns the currently selected objects in the Wwise Authoring UI.
